RESOLVED_ENTITIES.U.S. Government Attorney rebuttal witnes: Ramon Gonzalez Sanchez's father and Ramon Gonzalez Sanchez's mother
RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the two rebuttal witnesses: Ramon Gonzalez Sanchez's father and Ramon Gonzalez Sanchez's mother

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Alfredo Ortega-Chavez: defendant and appellant in a case involving conspiracy and aiding and abetting the smuggling of undocumented aliens into the United States
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon Gonzalez Sanchez's father and Ramo: rebuttal witnesses whose testimony confirmed Alfredo Ortega-Chavez was in Sabinas Hidalgo on November 21 and 22, thus rebutting Graciela Castaneda's alibi
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.district court: court presiding over Alfredo Ortega-Chavez's trial, responsible for enforcing disclosure rules and excluding undisclosed witnesses
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Graciela Castaneda: Alfredo Ortega-Chavez's witness providing alibi testimony
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon Gonzalez Sanchez's father: rebuttal witness testifying against Alfredo Ortega-Chavez's alibi, placing him in Sabinas Hidalgo on November 22, 1980
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon Gonzalez Sanchez's mother: rebuttal witness testifying against Alfredo Ortega-Chavez's alibi, recalling having seen him in Sabinas Hidalgo on the evening of November 21, 1980
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.U.S. Government Attorney: prosecutor in the case against Alfredo Ortega-Chavez, responsible for disclosing witness information
